text.p: Casino Airlink Inc said on Tuesday that based on existing trends and the addition of planned new destination and origination sites, the company expects to generate in 1997 about $1.9 million in net income, or about $0.38 per share, on projected revenues of about $20 million.

The company reported net income of about $330,000, or $0.07 per share, on revenues of about $15 million from continuing operations for the nine months ended October 31, 1996 and a loss of $1.1 million from operations discontinued in the first six months of the year.
A company spokesman was not available to provide figures for the same period last year.
